程序包 com.oligei.ticketgathering.dao

接口 ActitemDao

所有已知实现类:
ActitemDaoImpl
public interface ActitemDao

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Actitem add​(int activityId, java.lang.String website)
    save actitem
    java.lang.Boolean deleteActitem​(java.lang.Integer actitemId)
    delete Actitem from database
    void deleteMongoDBByActitemId​(java.lang.Integer actitemId)
    delete data from moongoDB
    java.util.List<Actitem> findAllByActivityId​(java.lang.Integer id)
    use activityId to find all the actitem
    Actitem findOneById​(java.lang.Integer id)
    use actitemId to find the actitem
    ActitemMongoDB insertActitemInMongo​(int actitemId, java.util.List<com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject> price)
    insert into mongoDB
    boolean modifyRepository​(int actitemId, int price, int amount, java.lang.String showtime)
    modify data in mongoDB and Mysql amount为正时为增加，amount为负时减少
